scoringPlays.text: Brycen Hopkins 17 Yd pass from Elijah Sindelar (Spencer Evans Kick)
A.J. Ouellette 4 Yd Run (Louie Zervos Kick)
Tario Fuller 1 Yd Run (Spencer Evans Kick)
Cole Herdman 62 Yd pass from David Blough (J.D. Dellinger Kick)
Anthony Mahoungou 31 Yd pass from David Blough (Spencer Evans Kick)
Julian Ross 1 Yd Run (Louie Zervos Kick)
Jackson Anthrop 5 Yd pass from David Blough (J.D. Dellinger Kick)
Cameron Odom 25 Yd pass from Nathan Rourke (Louie Zervos Kick)

videos.description: Purdue's Elijah Sindelar finds Brycen Hopkins in the end zone for the 17-yard touchdown.
videos.headline: Purdue strikes first with TD

videos.description: Ohio's Papi White drags his foot to make the 16-yard catch.
videos.headline: Ohio's White drags his feet for the catch

videos.description: Ohio's A.J. Ouellette runs into the end zone for the 4-yard touchdown.
videos.headline: Ohio answers with TD

videos.description: Purdue's Tario Fuller runs into the end zone to give the Boilermakers the lead in the second quarter.
videos.headline: Boilermakers steam ahead
